conbody.p: This manual includes four types of safety prompts: danger, warning, caution and note.
Warning: Any negligence toward these prompts may result in serious injury or death.
Caution: Any negligence toward these prompts may result in minor or moderate personnel injury or damage to the device or other properties.
Notice: Prompts indicating information that may involve personnel safety or property protection.
These prompts are described in the following forms.

note.p: Safety information - risk factors and results.
Safety information - risk factors and results.
You must comply with the safety information.
